content: a bunch of us are hanging out here: https://gather.town/n3WuxZO61Xq9p1Gq/act2020. It's videoconferencing on a 2d map, a possible alternative to jitsi
all welcome to join us -- it's lots of fun!
this is such a cool concept!! I'm having food just now but will try and join later if people are still around
I think we should keep using this. It's fun!
